app_descript:
App Name: Addons for Minecraft Package Name: com.kayenworks.mcpeaddons

Brief:

"Addons for Minecraft" is an expansive app that empowers Minecraft enthusiasts to revolutionize their gaming experience by allowing them to utilize Add-Ons. These Add-Ons provide gamers with the tools to transform game worlds, alter mob behavior, and craft entirely new gameplay dynamics. With an easy-to-use interface, users can change mob appearances, create novel worlds, and bolster their Minecraft play without the need for complex modifications or unauthorized hacks.
